description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ラブリースターインパクト
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ラブリースターインパクト
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ひっさつのピカチュート
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: すなあつめ
description: 最大ＨＰの　半分\n自分の　ＨＰを　回復する。\nすなあらしの時は　多く　回復。

name: であいがしら
description: 威力が　高い　技　だが\n戦闘に　出たら\nすぐに　出さないと　成功　しない。

name: トーチカ
description: 相手の　攻撃を　防ぐと\n同時に　触れた　相手に\n毒を　与えてしまう。

name: かげぬい
description: 攻撃と　同時に\n相手の　影を　縫い付けて\n逃げられなくする。

name: ＤＤラリアット
description: 両腕を　回し　相手に　当てる。\n相手の　能力変化に\n関係なく　ダメージを　与える。

name: うたかたのアリア
description: 歌うことによって　たくさんの\nバルーンを　放出する。\n技を　受けると　やけどが　治る。

name: アイスハンマー
description: 強くて　重い　こぶしを\nふるって　ダメージを　与える。\n自分の　素早さが　さがる。

name: フラワーヒール
description: 最大ＨＰの　半分\n相手の　ＨＰを　回復する。\nグラスフィールドの時　効果が　あがる。

name: １０まんばりき
description: 全身を　使って\n相手に　猛アタックする。

name: ちからをすいとる
description: 相手の　攻撃力と　同じだけ\n自分の　ＨＰを　回復する。\nそして　相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

name: ソーラーブレード
description: １ターン目に　光を　いっぱいに　集め\n２ターン目に　その　力を\n剣に　込めて　攻撃する。

name: このは
description: はっぱを　相手に　当てて\n攻撃する。

name: スポットライト
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: どくのいと
description: 毒の　混じった　糸を　吹き付ける。\n相手を　毒にして\n素早さを　さげる。

name: とぎすます
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: アシストギア
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: じごくづき
description: この　技を　受けた　相手は\n地獄の　苦しみから　２ターンの間\n音の　技を　出すことが　できなくなる。

name: かふんだんご
description: 敵には　爆発する　だんごを\n使って　攻撃。　味方には\n回復する　だんごを　与える。

name: アンカーショット
description: アンカーを　相手に　からませて\n攻撃する。　相手は\n逃げることが　できなくなる。

name: サイコフィールド
description: ５ターンの間　地面にいると\n先制技を　受けない。\nエスパータイプの　威力が　あがる。

name: とびかかる
description: 全力で　相手に\n飛びかかって　攻撃。\n相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

name: ほのおのムチ
description: 焼けたムチで　相手を　打ちつける。\n攻撃を　受けた　相手は\n防御が　さがる。

name: つけあがる
description: 自分の　強さを　鼻高々に\n攻撃する。自分の　能力が\nあがって　いるほど　威力が　あがる。

name: もえつきる
description: 全身の　ほのおを　すべて\n燃やして　大ダメージを　与える。\n自分の　ほのおタイプが　なくなる。

name: スピードスワップ
description: 相手の　素早さと\n自分の　素早さを\n入れ替えてしまう。

name: スマートホーン
description: とがった　つので　相手を\n突き刺して　攻撃する。\n攻撃は　必ず　命中する。

name: じょうか
description: 相手の　状態異常を　治す。\n治すと　自分は　ＨＰを\n回復　することが　できる。

name: めざめるダンス
description: 全力で　踊って　攻撃する。\nこの　技の　タイプは\n自分の　タイプと　同じになる。

name: コアパニッシャー
description: ダメージを　与えた　相手が\nすでに　行動を　終えていたら\n相手の　特性を　消してしまう。

name: トロピカルキック
description: 南国　由来の　熱い\nキックを　相手に　浴びせる。\n相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

name: さいはい
description: 相手が　出した　技を\n指示して　もう一度\n出させることが　できる。

name: くちばしキャノン
description: 最初に　クチバシを　加熱してから\n攻撃を　くりだす。\n加熱中に　さわると　やけどする。

name: スケイルノイズ
description: 全身の　うろこを　こすり\n大きな　音を　出して　攻撃する。\n攻撃後　自分の　防御が　さがる。

name: ドラゴンハンマー
description: 体を　ハンマーのように\n使って　相手に　襲いかかり\nダメージを　与える。

name: ぶんまわす
description: 自分の　体を\nぶんまわして　相手に\nダメージを　与える。

name: オーロラベール
description: ５ターンの　間　物理と\n特殊の　ダメージを　弱める。\nゆきの　時しか　出すことが　できない。

name: シャドーアローズストライク
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ハイパーダーククラッシャー
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: わだつみのシンフォニア
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ガーディアン・デ・アローラ
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: しちせいだっこんたい
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ライトニングサーフライド
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ほんきをだす　こうげき
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ナインエボルブースト
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: オリジンズスーパーノヴァ
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: トラップシェル
description: こうらの　トラップを　しかける。\n相手が　物理技を　出すと\n爆発して　ダメージを　与える。

name: フルールカノン
description: 強力な　ビームを　放ったあと\n自分の　特攻が　がくっと　さがる。

name: サイコファング
description: サイコパワーで　かみついて\n相手を　攻撃する。　ひかりのかべや\nリフレクター　なども　破壊できる。

name: じだんだ
description: 悔しさを　バネにして　攻撃する。\n前の　ターンに　技を　外していると\n威力が　倍に　なる。

name: シャドーボーン
description: 魂の　宿った　ホネで\n相手を　なぐりつけて　攻撃する。\n相手の　防御を　さげる　ことがある。

name: アクセルロック
description: 素早い　スピードで\n相手に　ぶつかって　攻撃する。\n必ず　先制攻撃　できる。

name: アクアブレイク
description: 水の　力で　相手に\nぶつかって　攻撃する。\n相手の　防御を　さげる　ことがある。

name: プリズムレーザー
description: プリズムの　力で　強力な\n光線を　発射する。\n次の　ターンは　動けなくなる。

name: シャドースチール
description: 相手の　影に　潜り込み\n相手の　能力アップを\n奪って　攻撃する。

name: メテオドライブ
description: 流星の　ような　勢いで\n突進する。　相手の　特性を\n無視して　攻撃　することが　できる。

name: シャドーレイ
description: 怪しい　光線を　放って\n攻撃する。相手の　特性を\n無視して　攻撃　することが　できる。

name: なみだめ
description: なみだめに　なって\n相手の　戦力を　喪失させる。\n相手の　攻撃と　特攻が　さがる。

name: びりびりちくちく
description: 相手に　ぶつかって　強力な\n電気を浴びせ　びりびりちくちく　させる。\n相手を　ひるませる　ことが　ある。

name: しぜんのいかり
description: 自然の　怒りを　相手に　ぶつける。\n相手の　ＨＰは　半分に　なる。

name: マルチアタック
description: 高い　エネルギーを　まといつつ\n相手に　ぶつかって　攻撃する。\nメモリに　より　タイプが　変わる。

name: １０００まんボルト
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ビックリヘッド
description: 自分の　頭を　爆発　させて\n周りの　すべてを　攻撃する。\n自分も　ダメージを　受けてしまう。

name: プラズマフィスト
description: 電気を　まとった　こぶしで\n攻撃。　ノーマルタイプの　技を\nでんきタイプに　してしまう。

name: フォトンゲイザー
description: 光の　柱で　攻撃する。\n攻撃と　特攻を　比べて\n高いほうで　ダメージを　与える。

name: てんこがすめつぼうのひかり
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: サンシャインスマッシャー
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ムーンライトブラスター
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ぽかぼかフレンドタイム
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ラジアルエッジストーム
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ブレイジングソウルビート
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ばちばちアクセル
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ざぶざぶサーフ
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ふわふわフォール
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ピカピカサンダー
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: いきいきバブル
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: びりびりエレキ
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めらめらバーン
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: どばどばオーラ
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: わるわるゾーン
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: すくすくボンバー
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: こちこちフロスト
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: きらきらストーム
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ブイブイブレイク
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: ダブルパンツァー
description: 胸の　ナットを　軸に　回転して\n２回　続けて　うでを　たたきつける。\n相手を　ひるませる　ことが　ある。

name: ダイウォール
description: 相手の　攻撃を\nまったく　受けない。\n連続で　だすと　失敗しやすい。

name: ダイマックスほう
description: 体内で　凝縮した　エネルギーを\nコアから　放って　攻撃する。

name: ねらいうち
description: 相手の　技を　引き受ける\n特性や　技の　影響を　無視して\n選んだ　相手を　攻撃　できる。

name: くらいつく
description: お互い　ひんしに　なるまで\n交代が　できなくなる。　どちらかの\nポケモンが　いなくなると　効果は消える。

name: ほおばる
description: 持っている　きのみを　食べて\n防御を　ぐーんと　あげる。

name: はいすいのじん
description: 自分の　すべての\n能力が　上がるが　交代　したり\n逃げることが　できなくなる。

name: タールショット
description: ねばねばの　タールを　浴びせて\n相手の　素早さを　下げる。\n相手は　ほのおが　弱点に　なる。

name: まほうのこな
description: まほうのこなを　浴びせて\n相手を　エスパータイプに　変化させる。

name: ドラゴンアロー
description: ドラメシヤで　２回　攻撃。\n相手が　２匹　いるときは\nそれぞれに　１回ずつ　攻撃する。

name: おちゃかい
description: おちゃかいを　ひらいて\n場にいる　ポケモンが　それぞれ\n持っている　きのみを　食べる。

name: たこがため
description: 相手を　逃げられなくする。\nかためられた　相手は　毎ターン\n防御と　特防が　下がる。

name: でんげきくちばし
description: 電気を　まとった　くちばしで　刺す。\n相手より　先に　攻撃できると\n技の　威力は　２倍に　なる。

name: エラがみ
description: かたい　エラで　かみつく。\n相手より　先に　攻撃できると\n技の　威力は　２倍に　なる。

name: コートチェンジ
description: 不思議な　力で\nお互いの　場の　効果を　入れ替える。

name: ダイバーン
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　ほのおタイプの　攻撃。\n５ターンの　間　日差しを　強くする。

name: ダイワーム
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　むしタイプの　攻撃。\n相手の　特攻を　下げる。

name: ダイサンダー
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　でんきタイプの　攻撃。\n５ターンの　間　エレキフィールドにする。

name: ダイアタック
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　ノーマルタイプの　攻撃。\n相手の　素早さを　下げる。

name: ダイナックル
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　かくとうタイプの　攻撃。\n味方の　攻撃を　上げる。

name: ダイホロウ
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　ゴーストタイプの　攻撃。\n相手の　防御を　下げる。

name: ダイアイス
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　こおりタイプの　攻撃。\n５ターンの　間　ゆきを　降らす。

name: ダイアシッド
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　どくタイプの　攻撃。\n味方の　特攻を　上げる。

name: ダイストリーム
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　みずタイプの　攻撃。\n５ターンの　間　雨を　降らせる。

name: ダイジェット
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　ひこうタイプの　攻撃。\n味方の　素早さを　上げる。

name: ダイフェアリー
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　フェアリータイプの　攻撃。\n５ターンの　間　ミストフィールドにする。

name: ダイドラグーン
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　ドラゴンタイプの　攻撃。\n相手の　攻撃を　下げる。

name: ダイサイコ
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　エスパータイプの　攻撃。\n５ターンの　間　サイコフィールドにする。

name: ダイロック
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　いわタイプの　攻撃。\n５ターンの　間　砂あらしにする。

name: ダイアース
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　じめんタイプの　攻撃。\n味方の　特防を　上げる。

name: ダイアーク
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　あくタイプの　攻撃。\n相手の　特防を　下げる。

name: ダイソウゲン
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　くさタイプの　攻撃。\n５ターンの　間　グラスフィールドにする。

name: ダイスチル
description: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが\n繰りだす　はがねタイプの　攻撃。\n味方の　防御を　上げる。

name: ソウルビート
description: 自分の　ＨＰを　少し　削って\nすべての　能力を　上げる。

name: ボディプレス
description: 体を　ぶつけて　攻撃。\n防御が　高いほど\n与える　ダメージが　増える。

name: デコレーション
description: かざりつけを　することで\n相手の　攻撃と　特攻を\nぐーんと　上げる。

name: ドラムアタック
description: ドラムの　根っこを　ドラミングで\nコントロールして　こうげき　することで\n相手の　素早さを　下げる。

name: トラバサミ
description: トラバサミで　捕らえて\n４－５ターンの　間\n相手を　はさんで　攻撃する。

name: かえんボール
description: 小石を　燃やした　炎の　ボールで\n相手を　攻撃する。\nやけど　状態に　することが　ある。

name: きょじゅうざん
description: 全身で　強大な剣を　振りかざし\n勢いよく　切りかかって　攻撃する。

name: きょじゅうだん
description: 全身を　強固な盾へと　変化させ\n勢いよく　ぶつかって　攻撃する。

name: オーラぐるま
description: ほほぶくろに　溜めた　エネルギーで\n攻撃し　自分の　素早さを　あげる。\nモルペコの　姿で　タイプが　変わる。

name: ワイドブレイカー
description: きょうじんな　しっぽを　激しく\nふりはらって　相手を　攻撃する。\n相手の　攻撃を　下げる。

name: えだづき
description: するどく　とがった　枝で\n相手を　突いて　攻撃する。

name: オーバードライブ
description: ギターや　ベースを　かきならして\n激しく　響く　大きな　振動を\n相手に　与えて　攻撃する。

name: りんごさん
description: すっぱい　りんごから　つくりだした\n酸性の　液体で　攻撃。\n相手の　特防を　下げる。

name: Ｇのちから
description: 高いところから　りんごを　落として\nダメージを　与える。\n相手の　防御を　下げる。

name: ソウルクラッシュ
description: 食らうと　くじけるほどの\n勢いで　攻撃。\n相手の　特攻を　下げる。

name: ワンダースチーム
description: 煙を　噴出して\n相手を　攻撃。\n混乱　させることが　ある。

name: いのちのしずく
description: 不思議な　水を　ふりまいて\n自分と　場にいる\n味方の　ＨＰを　回復する。

name: ブロッキング
description: 相手の　攻撃を　まったく　受けない。\n連続で　だすと　失敗しやすい。\n触れると　防御が　がくっと　下がる。

name: どげざつき
description: 頭を　下げる　ふりを　しながら\n振りみだした　髪の毛を　突き刺す。\n攻撃は　必ず　命中する。

name: スターアサルト
description: 太い　クキを　ふりまわして　攻撃。\nただし　自分も　よろめいてしまうため\n次の　ターンは　動けなくなる。

name: ムゲンダイビーム
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: てっていこうせん
description: 全身から　集めた　はがねを\nビームとして　激しく　撃ちだす。\n自分も　ダメージを　受けてしまう。

name: ワイドフォース
description: サイコパワーで　相手を　攻撃する。\nサイコフィールドの時　威力が　あがり\nすべての　相手に　ダメージを　与える。

name: アイアンローラー
description: フィールドを　破壊しながら　攻撃。\nなんらかの　フィールド状態に\n変わっていないと　技は　失敗する。

name: スケイルショット
description: ウロコを　撃ちだして　攻撃する。\n２ー５回の　間　連続で　だす。\n素早さが　あがるが　防御が　さがる。

name: メテオビーム
description: １ターン目に　宇宙の　力を\n集めることで　特攻が　あがり\n２ターン目に　相手を　攻撃する。

name: シェルアームズ
description: 物理か　特殊か　より多く　ダメージを\n与えられる　能力で　攻撃する。\n毒状態に　することが　ある。

name: ミストバースト
description: 自分の　周りに　いる　すべてを\n攻撃するが　使うと　瀕死になる。\nミストフィールドで　威力が　あがる。

name: グラススライダー
description: 地面を　滑るように　相手を　攻撃。\nグラスフィールドの時\n必ず　先制攻撃　できる。

name: ライジングボルト
description: 地面から　立ちのぼる　電撃で　攻撃。\n相手が　エレキフィールドに　いる時\n技の　威力が　２倍に　なる。

name: だいちのはどう
description: フィールドの力を　借りて　攻撃。\n使った時の　フィールドの状態に　よって\n技の　タイプと　威力が　変わる。

name: はいよるいちげき
description: 背後から　はいより　攻撃する。\n相手の　特攻を　さげる。

name: しっとのほのお
description: しっとの　エネルギーで　相手を　攻撃。\nそのターン　能力が　あがった　ポケモンを\nやけどの　状態に　する。

name: うっぷんばらし
description: 相手への　いらだちを　ぶつけて　攻撃。\nそのターンに　能力を　さげられていると\n技の　威力が　２倍に　なる。

name: ポルターガイスト
description: 相手の　持ち物を　あやつって　攻撃。\n相手が　道具を　持っていない　場合は\n失敗する。

name: ふしょくガス
description: 強い　酸性の　ガスで\n周りに　いるものを　包みこみ\n持っている　道具を　溶かしてしまう。

name: コーチング
description: 的確な　指導を　おこなうことで\n味方　全員の\n攻撃と　防御を　上げる。

name: クイックターン
description: 攻撃した　あと\nものすごい　スピードで　戻ってきて\n控えの　ポケモンと　入れ替わる。

name: トリプルアクセル
description: ３回連続で　キックを　くりだして\n攻撃する。　技が　当たるたびに\n威力は　あがる。

name: ダブルウイング
description: 翼を　相手に　ぶつけて\n攻撃する。　２回連続で\nダメージを　与える。

name: ねっさのだいち
description: 熱く　焼けた　砂を\n相手に　ぶつけて　攻撃する。\nやけど状態に　することが　ある。

name: ジャングルヒール
description: ジャングルと　一体化して\n自分と　場にいる　味方の\nＨＰと　状態を　回復する。

name: あんこくきょうだ
description: あくの型を　極めし\n強烈な　一撃。\n必ず　急所に　当たる。

name: すいりゅうれんだ
description: みずの型を　極めし\n流れるような　３回の　連撃。\n必ず　急所に　当たる。

name: サンダープリズン
description: ほとばしる　電気の　おりの　中に\n４ー５ターンの　間\n相手を　閉じこめて　攻撃する。

name: ドラゴンエナジー
description: 生命力を　パワーに　変え　相手を\n攻撃する。　自分の　ＨＰが　少ないほど\n技の　威力は　さがる。

name: いてつくしせん
description: 両目から　サイコパワーを\n撃ちだして　攻撃する。\nこおり状態に　することが　ある。

name: もえあがるいかり
description: 怒りを　炎の　ような\nオーラに　変えて　攻撃する。\n相手を　ひるませることが　ある。

name: らいめいげり
description: 雷の　ような　動きで\n相手を　翻弄しながら　キックする。\n相手の　防御を　さげる。

name: ブリザードランス
description: 吹雪を　まとった　氷の　槍を\n相手に　投げつけて　攻撃する。

name: アストラルビット
description: たくさんの　小さな　霊体を\n相手に　ぶつけて　攻撃する。

name: ぶきみなじゅもん
description: 強力な　サイコパワーで　攻撃。\n相手が　最後に　使った技の\nＰＰを　３だけ　減らす。

name: フェイタルクロー
description: 破滅的なツメで　攻撃する。\n相手を　どく　まひ　ねむりの\nいずれかの状態に　することも　ある。

name: バリアーラッシュ
description: 思念のエネルギーを　まといながら\n相手に　ぶつかっていく。\n自分の　防御を　あげる。

name: パワーシフト
description: 自分の　攻撃と\n防御を　入れ替える。

name: がんせきアックス
description: 岩の斧で　攻撃する。\nばらまかれた　岩の破片が\n相手の　周りに　浮かぶ。

name: はるのあらし
description: 愛憎　入りまじった　強烈な風で\n相手を　包みこんで　攻撃する。\n相手の　攻撃を　さげることが　ある。

name: しんぴのちから
description: 不思議な力を　放出して　攻撃する。\n自分の　特攻が　あがる。

name: だいふんげき
description: ２ー３ターンの　間\n炎を　放ちながら　暴れまわる。\n暴れたあとは　混乱する。

name: ウェーブタックル
description: 水を　まといつつ\n全身で　相手に　ぶつかるが\n自分も　かなりの　ダメージ　を受ける。

name: クロロブラスト
description: 自身の　葉緑素を　集約し\n放出して　攻撃する。\n自分も　ダメージを　受けてしまう。

name: ひょうざんおろし
description: 氷山のような　大きな\n氷塊を　ぶつけて　攻撃する。\n相手を　ひるませることが　ある。

name: しょうりのまい
description: 勝利を　呼びこむ　舞を\n激しく　踊って　自分の\n攻撃と　防御と　素早さを　あげる。

name: ぶちかまし
description: 全身全霊の　たいあたりを　くらわせる。\n自分の　防御と　特防が　さがる。

name: どくばりセンボン
description: 無数の毒針で　相手を　毒状態に\nすることもある。　相手が　毒状態だと\n威力は　２倍になる。

name: オーラウイング
description: オーラで　強化した翼で　切り裂く。\n急所に　当たりやすい。\n自分の　素早さを　あげる。

name: うらみつらみ
description: 背筋が　凍るような　怨念で　攻撃して\n相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

name: たてこもる
description: 皮膚を　鉄の盾のように　硬くすることで\n自分の　防御を　ぐーんと　あげる。

name: ３ぼんのや
description: 足技のあと　３本の矢を　同時に放つ。\n相手の　防御を　さげたり　ひるませることが\nある。　急所に　当たりやすい。

name: ひゃっきやこう
description: 無数の火の玉で　攻撃して\nやけど状態に　することが　ある。\n相手が　状態異常だと　威力は　２倍。

name: ひけん・ちえなみ
description: 貝殻の剣で　攻撃する。\nばらまかれた　貝殻の破片は　相手の\n足下に　まきびし　となって　散らばる。

name: こがらしあらし
description: 身も心も　震える　冷たく\n激しい風で　攻撃する。\n相手の　素早さを　さげることが　ある。

name: かみなりあらし
description: 嵐を　起こし　雷雲を　呼びよせ\n雷と風で　激しく　攻撃をする。\n相手を　まひ状態に　することもある。

name: ねっさのあらし
description: 熱く焼けた砂と　強烈な風で\n包みこんで　攻撃する。\n相手を　やけど状態に　することがある。

name: みかづきのいのり
description: みかづきに　いのりを　ささげて\n自分と　場にいる　味方の\nＨＰと　状態を　回復する。

name: ブレイブチャージ
description: 心を　奮わせて\n自分の　状態異常を　治し\nさらには　特攻と　特防を　あげる。

name: テラバースト
description: テラスタルだと　テラスタイプの　エネルギーを\n放出して　攻撃する。　攻撃と　特攻を　比べて\n高いほうで　ダメージを　与える。

name: スレッドトラップ
description: 糸の罠を　はりめぐらせる。\n相手の　攻撃を　防ぐと　同時に\n触れた　相手の　素早さを　さげる。

name: かかとおとし
description: 蹴りあげた　かかとを　落として　攻撃する。\n相手を　混乱させることが　ある。\nはずすと　自分が　ダメージを　受ける。

name: おはかまいり
description: 仲間の　無念を　晴らすため　攻撃する。\n倒された　味方のポケモンが　多いほど\n技の　威力が　増える。

name: ルミナコリジョン
description: 精神にも　作用する\n奇妙な光を　放って　攻撃する。\n相手の　特防を　がくっと　さげる。

name: いっちょうあがり
description: いなせな　身のこなしで　攻撃。\n口の中に　シャリタツが　いると\nそのすがたによって　能力が　あがる。

name: ジェットパンチ
description: 激流を　こぶしに　まとって\n目にも　留まらぬ　パンチを　くりだす。\n必ず　先制攻撃　できる。

name: ハバネロエキス
description: とんでもなく　辛いエキスを　出す。\n相手の　攻撃が　ぐーんと　あがり\n防御が　がくっと　さがる。

name: ホイールスピン
description: 足に　負荷を　かけることにより\n激しく　回転して　ダメージを　与える。\n自分の　素早さが　がくっと　さがる。

name: ネズミざん
description: 仲間たちが　わらわらと　集まって\nコンビネーションで　攻撃を　与えていく。\n１ー１０回の　間　連続で　あたる。

name: アイススピナー
description: 足に　薄い氷を　まとい\nクルクルと　回りながら　ぶつかる。\n回転の　動きによって　フィールドを　壊す。

name: きょけんとつげき
description: 体を　投げだす　無謀な突撃。\n技のあと　相手からの　攻撃は　必ず\n命中し　ダメージが　２倍に　なってしまう。

name: さいきのいのり
description: 慈愛の心で　いのることにより\n控えにいる　ひんしの　ポケモンを\nＨＰを　半分の状態で　復活させる。

name: しおづけ
description: 相手を　しおづけ状態に　して\n毎ターン　ダメージを　与える。\nはがね　みずタイプは　より　苦しむ。

name: トリプルダイブ
description: 息のあった　飛びこみを　することで\n相手に　水しぶきを　あてる。\n３回連続で　ダメージを　与える。

name: キラースピン
description: 回転して　相手を　攻撃する。\nしめつける　まきつく　やどりぎのタネ　など\n吹きとばす。　相手を　毒状態に　する。

name: うつしえ
description: 相手の本質を　とらえて　うつしだし\n自分と　味方を　相手と\n同じ　特性に　変化させる。

name: みをけずる
description: 自分の　ＨＰを　けずって\n自分の　攻撃と　特攻と\n素早さを　ぐーんと　あげる。

name: ドゲザン
description: 土下座して　相手を\n油断させておいて　切りかかる。\n攻撃は　必ず　命中する。

name: トリックフラワー
description: 細工がある　花たばを\n相手に　投げて　攻撃する。\n必ず　命中して　急所にも　当たる。

name: フレアソング
description: 燃えたぎる　火炎を　歌うように\n吹きつけて　相手を　焦がす。\n自分の　特攻を　あげる。

name: アクアステップ
description: 水もしたたる　かろやかな　足どりで\n相手を　翻弄し　ダメージを　与える。\n自分の　素早さを　あげる。

name: レイジングブル
description: 怒り狂う　あばれうしの　猛烈な　タックル。\nフォルムで　技のタイプが　変わり\nひかりのかべや　リフレクターなども　破壊できる。

name: ゴールドラッシュ
description: 大量のコインを　ぶちまけて　攻撃。\n自分の　特攻が　さがる。\n戦闘の　あとで　お金も　もらえる。

name: サイコブレイド
description: 実体のない刃で　相手を　切り裂く。\nエレキフィールドに　いるとき\n技の威力が　１．５倍に　なる。

name: ハイドロスチーム
description: 煮えたぎる水を　勢いよく　浴びせる。\n日差しが　強いとき　技の威力が\nさがるどころか　１．５倍に　なる。

name: カタストロフィ
description: 破滅的な　災厄を　巻き起こし\n相手の　ＨＰを　半分に　する。

name: アクセルブレイク
description: 変形しながら　荒々しく　落下し\nいにしえの　大爆発を　引き起こす。\n弱点をつくと　さらに　威力が　増す。

name: イナズマドライブ
description: 変形しながら　超高速で　走行し\n未知なる　電撃が　相手を　つらぬく。\n弱点をつくと　さらに　威力が　増す。

name: しっぽきり
description: 自分の　ＨＰを　削って\n分身を　だしたあと　もどってきて\n控えの　ポケモンと　入れ替わる。

name: さむいギャグ
description: 場を　凍らせる　ギャグを　言い残し\n控えの　ポケモンと　入れ替わる。\n５ターンの　間　ゆきを　降らす。

name: おかたづけ
description: まきびし　ステルスロック　ねばねばネット\nどくびし　みがわりを　すべて　かたづける。\n自分の　攻撃と　素早さが　あがる。

name: ゆきげしき
description: ５ターンの　間　ゆきを　降らせる。\nこおりタイプの　防御が　あがる。

name: とびつく
description: 相手に　飛びついて　攻撃する。\n相手の　素早さを　さげる。

name: くさわけ
description: 草むらから　飛びだすように　攻撃する。\n軽快な　足どりに　よって\n自分の　素早さを　あげる。

name: ひやみず
description: 相手の　元気を　失わせるくらい\n冷たい水を　浴びせて　攻撃する。\n相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

name: ハイパードリル
description: とがった　体の部位を\n急速に　回転させ　つらぬく。\nまもるや　みきり　なども　無視　できる。

name: ツインビーム
description: 両目から　不可思議な\n光線を　発射して　攻撃する。\n２回連続で　ダメージを　与える。

name: ふんどのこぶし
description: 怒りを　エネルギーに　変えて　攻撃。\n受けた　攻撃の　回数が　多いほど\n技の　威力が　あがる。

name: アーマーキャノン
description: みずからの　ヨロイを　燃えたぎる\n弾として　撃ち出して　攻撃する。\n自分の　防御と　特防が　さがる。

name: むねんのつるぎ
description: この世への　未練を　剣先に　こめて\n切りつける。　与えた　ダメージの\n半分の　ＨＰを　回復できる。

name: でんこうそうげき
description: 全身の　でんきを　すべて\n放って　大ダメージを　与える。\n自分の　でんきタイプが　なくなる。

name: デカハンマー
description: 大きな　ハンマーを　体ごと\nぶんまわして　攻撃する。\nこの技は　２回連続で　だせない。

name: ほうふく
description: 技を　だす前に\n最後に　受けた　技の　ダメージを\n大きくして　だした　相手に　やり返す。

name: アクアカッター
description: 加圧された　水を　刃のように\n噴射して　相手を　切り裂く。\n急所に　当たりやすい。

name: ブラッドムーン
description: 血のように　赤い満月から\nありったけの　気迫を　撃ちだす。\nこの技は　２回連続で　だせない。

name: シャカシャカほう
description: かきまぜた　お茶の　大砲は　与えた\nダメージの　半分の　ＨＰを　回復して\nやけど状態に　することも　ある。

name: みずあめボム
description: ねっとりした　みずあめを　爆発させ\n相手を　あめまみれ　状態に　して\n３ターンの間　素早さを　さげ続ける。

name: ツタこんぼう
description: ツタを　まきつけた　こん棒で　なぐる。\nかぶっている　お面で　タイプが　変わる。\n急所に　当たりやすい。

name: エレクトロビーム
description: １ターン目に　電気を　集めて　特攻が　あがり\n２ターン目に　高圧の　電気を　発射する。\n天気が　雨のときは　すぐに　発射できる。

name: テラクラスター
description: 結晶の力を　照射し　敵を　排除する。\nテラパゴスが　ステラフォルムで　放つと\nすべての　相手に　ダメージを　与える。

name: きまぐレーザー
description: 光線を　発射して　攻撃する。\nときどき　ほかの首も　協力して\nレーザーを　放ち　威力が　２倍に　なる。

name: かえんのまもり
description: 相手の　攻撃を　超高熱の\n体毛で　防ぎ　同時に　触れた\n相手に　やけどを　与えてしまう。

name: じんらい
description: 相手より　先に　電撃を　浴びせる。\n相手が　だす技が\n攻撃技でないと　失敗する。

name: パワフルエッジ
description: 頭部に　蓄積した　光で　切断する。\n守りを　無視して　攻撃できる。

name: タキオンカッター
description: 粒子の刃を　たて続けに　発射して\n２回連続で　ダメージを　与える。\n攻撃は　必ず　命中する。

name: ハードプレス
description: 腕やハサミで　相手を　圧迫する。\n相手の　ＨＰが　残っているほど\n威力が　あがる。

name: ドラゴンエール
description: 竜の鼓舞で　士気を　上げて\n味方の技が　急所に　当たりやすくなる。\nドラゴンタイプだと　より　鼓舞される。

name: みわくのボイス
description: 天使のような　歌声で　相手を　攻撃。\nそのターン　能力が　あがった　ポケモンを\n混乱の　状態に　する。

name: やけっぱち
description: 自棄になった　勢いで　攻撃する。\n前の　ターンに　技を　外していると\n威力が　倍に　なる。

name: サンダーダイブ
description: 体を　帯電させて　相手に　のしかかる。\nはずすと　自分が　ダメージを　受ける。

name: サイコノイズ
description: 不快な音波を　相手に　浴びせて　攻撃。\n２ターンの間　技や　特性や　持っている\n道具によって　ＨＰを　回復できなくなる。

name: はやてがえし
description: 動きに　反応して　掌底を　打ちこみ\n相手を　ひるませる。　相手が　だす技が\n先制攻撃でないと　失敗する。

name: じゃどくのくさり
description: 毒でできた鎖を　相手に　巻きつけ\n毒素を　流しこんで　蝕む。\n猛毒の　状態に　することが　ある。

name: めざめるパワー (かくとう)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (ひこう)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (どく)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (じめん)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (いわ)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (むし)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (ゴースト)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (はがね)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (ほのお)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (みず)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (くさ)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (でんき)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (エスパー)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (こおり)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (ドラゴン)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: めざめるパワー (あく)
description: この技は　使えません\n思い出すことが　できなくなりますが\n技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

name: テラバースト (ステラ)
description: 攻撃と　特攻　高いほうで　ダメージを　与える。\n相手が　テラスタルだと　効果は　バツグン。\n自分の　攻撃と　特攻が　さがる。

name: Pound
description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a\nforeleg, or the like.

name: Karate Chop
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Double Slap
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Comet Punch
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Mega Punch
description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-\npacked power.

name: Pay Day
description: Coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage.\nMoney is earned after the battle.

name: Fire Punch
description: The target is attacked with a fiery punch. This may also\nleave the target with a burn.

name: Ice Punch
description: The target is attacked with an icy punch. This may also\nleave the target frozen.

name: Thunder Punch
description: The target is attacked with an electrified punch. This may\nalso leave the target with paralysis.

name: Scratch
description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict\ndamage.

name: Vise Grip
description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides\nto inflict damage.

name: Guillotine
description: A vicious tearing attack with big pincers. The target\nfaints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Razor Wind
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Swords Dance
description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply\nboosts the user’s Attack stat.

name: Cut
description: The target is cut with a scythe, a claw, or the like\nto inflict damage.

name: Gust
description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched\nat the target to inflict damage.

name: Wing Attack
description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread\nwide to inflict damage.

name: Whirlwind
description: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is\ndragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a\nsingle Pokémon.

name: Fly
description: The user flies up into the sky on the first turn, then\nattacks on the next turn.

name: Bind
description: A long body, tentacles, or the like are used to bind\nand squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Slam
description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like\nto inflict damage.

name: Vine Whip
description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to\ninflict damage.

name: Stomp
description: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big\nfoot. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Double Kick
description: The user attacks by kicking the target twice in a row\nusing two feet.

name: Mega Kick
description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-\npacked power.

name: Jump Kick
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Rolling Kick
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Sand Attack
description: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, lowering the\ntarget’s accuracy.

name: Headbutt
description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging\nstraight into the target. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: Horn Attack
description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to\ninflict damage.

name: Fury Attack
description: The user attacks by jabbing the target with a horn,\na beak, or the like. This move hits two to five times\nin a row.

name: Horn Drill
description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a\ndrill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams\ninto the target with its whole body.

name: Body Slam
description: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its\nfull body weight. This may also leave the target with\nparalysis.

name: Wrap
description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and\nsqueeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Take Down
description: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into\nthe target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Thrash
description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns.\nThe user then becomes confused.

name: Double-Edge
description: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes\nthe target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Tail Whip
description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon\nless wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

name: Poison Sting
description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger to\ninflict damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Twineedle
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Pin Missile
description: The user attacks by shooting sharp spikes at the target.\nThis move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Leer
description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer\nthat lowers their Defense stats.

name: Bite
description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may\nalso make the target flinch.

name: Growl
description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing\nPokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

name: Roar
description: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is\ndragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a\nsingle Pokémon.

name: Sing
description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a beautiful voice that puts\nthe target to sleep.

name: Supersonic
description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body\nthat confuse the target.

name: Sonic Boom
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Disable
description: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever\nmove it last used.

name: Acid
description: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh\nacid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

name: Ember
description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also\nleave the target with a burn.

name: Flamethrower
description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.\nThis may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Mist
description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist\nthat prevents any of their stats from being lowered\nfor five turns.

name: Water Gun
description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Hydro Pump
description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water\nlaunched under great pressure.

name: Surf
description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping\nits surroundings with a giant wave.

name: Ice Beam
description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy.\nThis may also leave the target frozen.

name: Blizzard
description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing\nPokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon\nfrozen.

name: Psybeam
description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also\nconfuse the target.

name: Bubble Beam
description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target.\nThis may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

name: Aurora Beam
description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may\nalso lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: Hyper Beam
description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user\ncan’t move on the next turn.

name: Peck
description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn\nto inflict damage.

name: Drill Peck
description: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp\nbeak acting as a drill.

name: Submission
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Low Kick
description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over.\nThe heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Counter
description: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move,\ninflicting double the damage taken.

name: Seismic Toss
description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts\ndamage equal to the user’s level.

name: Strength
description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum\npower.

name: Absorb
description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored\nby up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Mega Drain
description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored\nby up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Leech Seed
description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from\nthe target every turn.

name: Growth
description: The user’s body grows all at once, boosting the Attack\nand Sp. Atk stats.

name: Razor Leaf
description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing\nPokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing\na critical hit.

name: Solar Beam
description: The user gathers light on the first turn, then blasts a\nbundled beam on the next turn.

name: Poison Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons\nthe target.

name: Stun Spore
description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that\nparalyzes the target.

name: Sleep Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of soporific dust that puts the\ntarget to sleep.

name: Petal Dance
description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for\ntwo to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: String Shot
description: The user blows silk from its mouth that binds opposing\nPokémon and harshly lowers their Speed stats.

name: Dragon Rage
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Fire Spin
description: The user traps the target inside a fierce vortex of fire\nthat inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Thunder Shock
description: The user attacks the target with a jolt of electricity.\nThis may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunderbolt
description: The user attacks the target with a strong electric blast.\nThis may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Wave
description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that\nparalyzes the target.

name: Thunder
description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict\ndamage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Rock Throw
description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target\nto inflict damage.

name: Earthquake
description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every\nPokémon around it.

name: Fissure
description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the\ntarget in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Dig
description: The user burrows into the ground on the first turn, then\nattacks on the next turn.

name: Toxic
description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison\ndamage worsens every turn.

name: Confusion
description: The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict\ndamage. This may also confuse the target.

name: Psychic
description: The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict\ndamage. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Hypnosis
description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the\ntarget fall asleep.

name: Meditate
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Agility
description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster.\nThis sharply boosts its Speed stat.

name: Quick Attack
description: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving\nat blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Rage
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Teleport
description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in\nwaiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

name: Night Shade
description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage.\nIt inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

name: Mimic
description: The user copies the move last used by the target.\nThe copied move can be used until the user of Mimic\nleaves the battle.

name: Screech
description: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target’s\nDefense stat.

name: Double Team
description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of\nitself to boost its evasiveness.

name: Recover
description: The user regenerates its cells, restoring its own HP by up\nto half its max HP.

name: Harden
description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to boost\nits Defense stat.

name: Minimize
description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller,\nwhich sharply boosts its evasiveness.

name: Smokescreen
description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink.\nThis lowers the target’s accuracy.

name: Confuse Ray
description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes\nconfusion.

name: Withdraw
description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell,\nboosting its Defense stat.

name: Defense Curl
description: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

name: Barrier
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Light Screen
description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage\nfrom special moves for five turns.

name: Haze
description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change\namong all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: Reflect
description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage\nfrom physical moves for five turns.

name: Focus Energy
description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that its\nfuture attacks have a heightened chance of landing\ncritical hits.

name: Bide
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Metronome
description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into\nrandomly using nearly any move.

name: Mirror Move
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Self-Destruct
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an\nexplosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Egg Bomb
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Lick
description: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict\ndamage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Smog
description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases.\nThis may also poison the target.

name: Sludge
description: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict\ndamage. This may also poison the target.

name: Bone Club
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Fire Blast
description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-\nconsuming fire. This may also leave the target with\na burn.

name: Waterfall
description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

name: Clamp
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Swift
description: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon.\nThis attack never misses.

name: Skull Bash
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Spike Cannon
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Constrict
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Amnesia
description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its\nconcerns. This sharply boosts the user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Kinesis
description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon.\nThis lowers the target’s accuracy.

name: Soft-Boiled
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: High Jump Kick
description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump.\nIf this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

name: Glare
description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on\nits belly to cause paralysis.

name: Dream Eater
description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target.\nThe user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage\ntaken by the target.

name: Poison Gas
description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the faces of\nopposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

name: Barrage
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Leech Life
description: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is\nrestored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Lovely Kiss
description: With a scary face, the user tries to kiss the target.\nIf it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

name: Sky Attack
description: The user attacks the turn after using this move. This move\nhas a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may\nalso make the target flinch.

name: Transform
description: The user transforms into a copy of the target, right down\nto having the same move set.

name: Bubble
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Dizzy Punch
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Spore
description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Flash
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Psywave
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Splash
description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect\nat all...

name: Acid Armor
description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself,\nsharply boosting its Defense stat.

name: Crabhammer
description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. This move\nhas a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Explosion
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a\ntremendous explosion. The user faints upon using\nthis move.

name: Fury Swipes
description: The user attacks by raking the target with claws, scythes,\nor the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Bonemerang
description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops\naround to damage the target twice—coming and going.

name: Rest
description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores\nthe user’s HP and cures any status conditions.

name: Rock Slide
description: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to\ninflict damage. This may also make the opposing\nPokémon flinch.

name: Hyper Fang
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Sharpen
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Conversion
description: The user changes its type to become the same type\nas the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

name: Tri Attack
description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack.\nThis may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

name: Super Fang
description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp\nfront fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

name: Slash
description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or\nthe like. This move has a heightened chance of landing\na critical hit.

name: Substitute
description: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of\nits own HP. The substitute serves as the user’s decoy.

name: Struggle
description: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has\nno remaining PP. It also damages the user a little.

name: Sketch
description: This move enables the user to permanently learn\nthe move last used by the target. Once used,\nSketch disappears.

name: Triple Kick
description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more\npowerful with each successful hit.

name: Thief
description: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item\nsimultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it\nalready holds an item.

name: Spider Web
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Mind Reader
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Nightmare
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Flame Wheel
description: The user attacks by cloaking itself in fire and charging\nat the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Snore
description: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep.\nThe harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

name: Curse
description: A move that has different effects depending on whether\nthe user is a Ghost type or not.

name: Flail
description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP\nthe user has, the greater the move’s power.

name: Conversion 2
description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to\nthe type of the move the target used last.

name: Aeroblast
description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage.\nThis move has a heightened chance of landing a\ncritical hit.

name: Cotton Spore
description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to\nopposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

name: Reversal
description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the\nless HP the user has.

name: Spite
description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used\nby the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

name: Powder Snow
description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow.\nThis may also leave opposing Pokémon frozen.

name: Protect
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from\nall attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used\nin succession.

name: Mach Punch
description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move\nalways goes first.

name: Scary Face
description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly\nlower its Speed stat.

name: Feint Attack
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Sweet Kiss
description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness\nthat causes confusion.

name: Belly Drum
description: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to\nhalf its max HP.

name: Sludge Bomb
description: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict\ndamage. This may also poison the target.

name: Mud-Slap
description: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage\nand lower its accuracy.

name: Octazooka
description: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face.\nThis may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Spikes
description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the feet of the\nopposing team. The spikes will damage opposing\nPokémon that switch into battle.

name: Zap Cannon
description: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon.\nThis also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Foresight
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Destiny Bond
description: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the\nPokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move’s\nchance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Perish Song
description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns,\nunless it switches out of battle.

name: Icy Wind
description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also\nlowers opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.

name: Detect
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from\nall attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used\nin succession.

name: Bone Rush
description: The user attacks by striking the target with a hard bone.\nThis move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Lock-On
description: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures\nthe user’s next move does not miss that target.

name: Outrage
description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns.\nThe user then becomes confused.

name: Sandstorm
description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to damage all\nPokémon except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. The\nsandstorm also boosts the Sp. Def stats of Rock types.

name: Giga Drain
description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by\nup to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Endure
description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP.\nThis move’s chance of failing rises if used in succession.

name: Charm
description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it\nless wary. This harshly lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Rollout
description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns.\nThis attack becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: False Swipe
description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from\nfainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Swagger
description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this\nalso sharply boosts the target’s Attack stat.

name: Milk Drink
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Spark
description: The user attacks the target with an electrically charged\ntackle. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Fury Cutter
description: The user attacks by slashing the target with scythes,\nclaws, or the like. This attack becomes more powerful\nif it hits in succession.

name: Steel Wing
description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also boost\nthe user’s Defense stat.

name: Mean Look
description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look.\nThe target becomes unable to flee.

name: Attract
description: If the target is of the opposite gender to the user, it\nbecomes infatuated with the user and will sometimes be\nunable to use its moves.

name: Sleep Talk
description: The user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.\nThis move can only be used while the user is asleep.

name: Heal Bell
description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to cure the status\nconditions of all its fellow party Pokémon and allies.

name: Return
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Present
description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden\ntrap. The gift restores HP sometimes, however.

name: Frustration
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Safeguard
description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status\nconditions for five turns.

name: Pain Split
description: The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally\nsplits the combined HP between the target and itself.

name: Sacred Fire
description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity.\nThis may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Magnitude
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Dynamic Punch
description: The user attacks by punching the target with full\nconcentrated power. This also confuses the target.

name: Megahorn
description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into\nthe target with no letup.

name: Dragon Breath
description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.\nThis may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Baton Pass
description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting\nand passes along any stat changes.

name: Encore
description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it\nencored for three turns.

name: Pursuit
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Rapid Spin
description: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate\nthe effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech\nSeed. This also boosts the user’s Speed stat.

name: Sweet Scent
description: The user releases a scent that harshly lowers opposing\nPokémon’s evasiveness.

name: Iron Tail

description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained\nvaries with the weather.

description: The user attacks by biting the target. If the target is\nholding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Charge Beam
description: The user attacks the target with an electric charge.\nThe residual electricity may also boost the user’s\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Wood Hammer
description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack.\nThis also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Aqua Jet
description: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving\nat blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Attack Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target.\nThis move has a heightened chance of landing a\ncritical hit.

name: Defend Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body,\nboosting its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Heal Order
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Head Smash
description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous full-power\nheadbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

name: Double Hit
description: The user slams the target with a tail or the like.\nThe target is hit twice in a row.

name: Roar of Time
description: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even\ntime. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Spacial Rend
description: The user tears the target along with the space around it.\nThis move has a heightened chance of landing a\ncritical hit.

name: Lunar Dance
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place\nwill have its HP and PP restored and its status conditions\ncured.

name: Crush Grip
description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the\ntarget has left, the greater the move’s power.

name: Magma Storm
description: The user traps the target inside a maelstrom of fire that\ninflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Dark Void
description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total\ndarkness that puts them to sleep.

name: Seed Flare
description: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack\nthe target. This may also harshly lower the target’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Ominous Wind
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Shadow Force
description: The user disappears on the first turn, then attacks on the\nnext turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Hone Claws
description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat\nand accuracy.

name: Wide Guard
description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging\nattacks for one turn.

name: Guard Split

name: Power Split
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack\nand Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

name: Wonder Room

name: Psyshock

name: Venoshock

name: Rage Powder

name: Magic Room

name: Smack Down

description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Catastropika
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Shore Up
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.\nIt regains more HP in a sandstorm.

name: First Impression
description: Although this move has great power, it works only on\nthe first turn each time the user enters battle.

name: Baneful Bunker
description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move\nalso poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Spirit Shackle
description: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the\ntarget’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target\nfrom fleeing.

name: Darkest Lariat
description: The user swings both arms and hits the target.\nThe target’s stat changes don’t affect the damage\ninflicted by this move.

name: Sparkling Aria
description: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.\nAny Pokémon suffering from a burn will be cured\nby the touch of these bubbles.

name: Ice Hammer
description: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to\ninflict damage. This also lowers the user’s Speed stat.

name: Floral Healing
description: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half its\nmax HP. More HP is restored when the ground is\nGrassy Terrain.

name: High Horsepower
description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: Strength Sap
description: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as\nthe target’s Attack stat. It then lowers the target’s\nAttack stat.

name: Solar Blade
description: The user gathers light on the first turn, then fills a blade\nwith the light’s energy and attacks on the next turn.

name: Leafage
description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: Spotlight
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Toxic Thread

name: Laser Focus
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Gear Up
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Throat Chop
description: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant\nsuffering prevents the target from using sound-based\nmoves for two turns.

name: Pollen Puff
description: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that\nexplodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a\npollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: Anchor Shot
description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while\nattacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Psychic Terrain
description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority\nmoves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

name: Lunge
description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with\nfull force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Fire Lash
description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also\nlowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Power Trip
description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.\nThe more the user’s stats are boosted, the greater the\nmove’s power.

name: Burn Up
description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.\nAfter using this move, the user will no longer be\nFire type.

name: Speed Swap
description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Smart Strike
description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack\nnever misses.

name: Purify
description: The user cures the target’s status condition. If the move\nsucceeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

name: Revelation Dance
description: The user attacks the target by dancing with all its might.\nThis move becomes the same type as the user’s type.

name: Core Enforcer
description: If the Pokémon damaged by this move have already\nused their moves that turn, this move eliminates the\neffects of those Pokémon’s Abilities.

name: Trop Kick

name: Instruct

name: Beak Blast
description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the\ntarget. Making direct contact with the user while it’s\nheating up its beak results in a burn.

name: Clanging Scales

name: Dragon Hammer

name: Brutal Swing

name: Aurora Veil
description: This move reduces damage from physical and special\nmoves for five turns. This can be used only when it is\nsnowing.

name: Sinister Arrow Raid

name: Fleur Cannon

name: Psychic Fangs
description: The user attacks by biting the target with its psychic\ncapabilities. This move can also break barriers, such as\nLight Screen and Reflect.

name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target.\nThis move’s power is doubled if the user’s previous\nmove failed.

name: Shadow Bone

name: Accelerock

name: Liquidation

name: Prismatic Laser

name: Spectral Thief

name: Sunsteel Strike

name: Moongeist Beam

name: Tearful Look

name: Zing Zap

name: Multi-Attack

name: Plasma Fists

name: Photon Geyser

name: Double Iron Bash
description: The user uses the hex nut in its chest as an axis to spin,\nstriking the target with its arms twice in a row. This may\nalso make the target flinch.

name: Max Guard
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from\nall attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used\nin succession.

name: Dynamax Cannon
description: The user condenses energy within its body and unleashes\nthat energy from its core to inflict damage.

name: Snipe Shot
description: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s\nmoves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this\nmove to hit the chosen target.

name: Jaw Lock
description: This move prevents the user and the target from\nswitching out until either of them faints. The effect\ngoes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

name: Stuff Cheeks
description: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its\nDefense stat.

name: No Retreat

name: Tar Shot

name: Magic Powder

name: Dragon Darts
description: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two\nopposing Pokémon, this move hits each of them once.

name: Teatime
description: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon currently in\nthe battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: Octolock

name: Bolt Beak
description: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak.\nThis move’s power is doubled if the user moves\nbefore the target.

name: Fishious Rend
description: The user rends the target with its hard gills. This move’s\npower is doubled if the user moves before the target.

name: Court Change
description: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on\neither side of the field.

name: Max Flare
description: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThe user intensifies the sun for five turns.

name: Max Flutterby
description: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Max Lightning
description: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThe user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for\nfive turns.

name: Max Strike
description: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Max Knuckle
description: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis boosts ally Pokémon’s Attack stats.

name: Max Phantasm
description: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Max Hailstorm
description: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThe user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

name: Max Ooze
description: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis boosts ally Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stats.

name: Max Geyser
description: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThe user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

name: Max Airstream
description: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis boosts ally Pokémon’s Speed stats.

name: Max Starfall
description: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThe user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for\nfive turns.

name: Max Wyrmwind
description: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Max Mindstorm
description: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThe user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for\nfive turns.

name: Max Rockfall
description: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThe user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

name: Max Quake
description: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis boosts ally Pokémon’s Sp. Def stats.

name: Max Darkness
description: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Max Overgrowth
description: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThe user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for\nfive turns.

name: Max Steelspike
description: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.\nThis boosts ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.

name: Clangorous Soul
description: The user boosts all its stats by using some of its own HP.

name: Body Press
description: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target.\nThe higher the user’s Defense stat, the greater the\ndamage this move deals.

name: Decorate
description: The user sharply boosts the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk\nstats by decorating the target.

name: Drum Beating
description: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots\nto attack the target. This also lowers the target’s\nSpeed stat.

name: Snap Trap
description: The user snares the target in a snap trap that inflicts\ndamage for four to five turns.

name: Pyro Ball
description: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching\nit as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the\ntarget with a burn.

name: Behemoth Blade
description: The user wields a large, powerful sword using its whole\nbody and cuts the target in a vigorous attack.

name: Behemoth Bash
description: The user’s body becomes a firm shield and slams into\nthe target fiercely.

name: Aura Wheel
description: Morpeko attacks and boosts its Speed stat with the\nenergy stored in its cheeks. This move’s type changes\ndepending on the user’s form.

name: Breaking Swipe
description: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing\nPokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: Branch Poke
description: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply\npointed branch.

name: Overdrive
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar\nor bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: Apple Acid
description: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created\nfrom tart apples. This also lowers the target’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Grav Apple
description: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from\nhigh above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Spirit Break
description: The user attacks the target with so much force that it\ncould break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the\ntarget’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Strange Steam
description: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may\nalso confuse the target.

name: Life Dew
description: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores\nthe HP of itself and its ally Pokémon currently in\nthe battle.

name: Obstruct
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all\nattacks. Its chance of failing rises if used in succession.\nDirect contact harshly lowers the attacker’s Defense stat.

name: False Surrender
description: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the\ntarget with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: Meteor Assault
description: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can’t\nmove on the next turn, because the force of this move\nmakes it stagger.

name: Eternabeam
description: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this\nmove is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t\nbe remembered.

name: Steel Beam
description: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its\nentire body. This also damages the user.

name: Expanding Force
description: The user attacks the target with its psychic power.\nWhen the ground is Psychic Terrain, this move’s power\nis boosted and it damages all opposing Pokémon.

name: Steel Roller
description: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move\nfails if the ground hasn’t turned into a terrain.

name: Scale Shot
description: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times\nin a row. This move boosts the user’s Speed stat but\nlowers its Defense stat.

name: Meteor Beam
description: The user gathers energy from space and boosts its\nSp. Atk stat on the first turn, then attacks on the\nnext turn.

name: Shell Side Arm
description: This move is either physical or special—whichever will\ninflict more damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Misty Explosion
description: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon\nusing this move. This move’s power is boosted on\nMisty Terrain.

name: Grassy Glide
description: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target.\nThis move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

name: Rising Voltage
description: The user attacks with electricity rising from the ground.\nThis move’s power is doubled if the target is on\nElectric Terrain.

name: Terrain Pulse
description: The user utilizes the energy of the terrain to attack.\nThis move’s type and power change depending on\nthe terrain at the time the move is used.

name: Skitter Smack
description: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also\nlowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Burning Jealousy
description: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves\nall opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted\nduring the turn with a burn.

name: Lash Out
description: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the\ntarget. This move’s power is doubled if the user’s stats\nwere lowered during this turn.

name: Poltergeist
description: The user attacks by controlling the target’s item.\nThis move fails if the target isn’t holding an item.

name: Corrosive Gas
description: The user surrounds everything around it with highly\nacidic gas and melts away items held by other Pokémon.

name: Coaching
description: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting\ntheir Attack and Defense stats.

name: Flip Turn
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch\nplaces with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Triple Axel
description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more\npowerful with each successful hit.

name: Dual Wingbeat
description: The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage.\nThe target is hit twice in a row.

name: Scorching Sands
description: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack.\nThis may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Jungle Healing
description: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and\ncuring status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon\ncurrently in the battle.

name: Wicked Blow
description: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the\ntarget with a fierce blow. This move always lands\na critical hit.

name: Surging Strikes
description: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the\ntarget with a flowing motion three times in a row. This\nmove always lands a critical hit.

name: Thunder Cage
description: The user traps the target inside a cage of sparking\nelectricity that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Dragon Energy
description: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks\nopposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower\nthe move’s power.

name: Freezing Glare
description: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack.\nThis may also leave the target frozen.

name: Fiery Wrath
description: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to\nattack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Thunderous Kick
description: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like\nmovement before delivering a kick. This also lowers\nthe target’s Defense stat.

name: Glacial Lance
description: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle\nlance at opposing Pokémon.

name: Astral Barrage
description: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small\nghosts at opposing Pokémon.

name: Eerie Spell
description: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power.\nThis also drains 3 PP from the move last used by the\ntarget.

name: Dire Claw
description: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws.\nThis may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or\nasleep.

name: Psyshield Bash
description: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into\nthe target. This also boosts the user’s Defense stat.

name: Power Shift
description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Stone Axe
description: The user swings its stone axes at the target. Stone\nsplinters left behind by this attack float around the\ntarget.

name: Springtide Storm
description: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in\nfierce winds brimming with love and hate. This may also\nlower their Attack stats.

name: Mystical Power
description: The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power.\nThis also boosts the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Raging Fury
description: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to\nthree turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Wave Crash
description: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target\nwith its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages\nthe user quite a lot.

name: Chloroblast
description: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict\ndamage on the target. This also damages the user.

name: Mountain Gale
description: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict\ndamage. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Victory Dance
description: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory,\nboosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

name: Headlong Rush
description: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle.\nThis also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Barb Barrage
description: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict\ndamage. This may also poison the target. This move’s\npower is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

name: Esper Wing
description: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings.\nThis also boosts the user’s Speed stat. This move has\na heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Bitter Malice
description: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment.\nThis also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Shelter
description: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply\nboosting its Defense stat.

name: Triple Arrows
description: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a\nheightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also\nlower the target’s Defense stat or make it flinch.

name: Infernal Parade
description: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also\nleave the target with a burn. This move’s power is\ndoubled if the target has a status condition.

name: Ceaseless Edge
description: The user slashes its shell blade at the target. Shell\nsplinters left behind by this attack remain scattered\nunder the target as spikes.

name: Bleakwind Storm
description: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause\nboth body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the\nSpeed stats of opposing Pokémon.

name: Wildbolt Storm
description: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely\nattacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave\nopposing Pokémon with paralysis.

name: Sandsear Storm
description: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in\nfierce winds and searingly hot sand. This may also leave\nthem with a burn.

name: Lunar Blessing
description: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon,\nrestoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and\nits ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

name: Take Heart
description: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions\nand boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Tera Blast
description: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its\nTera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or\nSp. Atk stat—whichever is higher for the user.

name: Silk Trap
description: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from\ndamage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker\nthat makes direct contact.

name: Axe Kick
description: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming\nits heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the\ntarget. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

name: Last Respects
description: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated\nallies there are in the user’s party, the greater the move’s\npower.

name: Lumina Crash
description: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even\naffects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Order Up
description: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a\nTatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user’s\nstats based on the Tatsugiri’s form.

name: Jet Punch
description: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches\nat blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Spicy Extract
description: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply\nboosting the target’s Attack stat and harshly lowering\nthe target’s Defense stat.

name: Spin Out
description: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting\ndamage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user’s\nSpeed stat.

name: Population Bomb
description: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo\nattack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

name: Ice Spinner
description: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around,\nslamming into the target. This move’s spinning motion\nalso destroys the terrain.

name: Glaive Rush
description: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge.\nAfter this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss\nand will inflict double damage until the user’s next turn.

name: Revival Blessing
description: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party\nPokémon that has fainted and restoring half that\nPokémon’s max HP.

name: Salt Cure
description: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every\nturn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected\nby this move.

name: Triple Dive
description: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting\nthe target with splashes of water three times in a row.

name: Mortal Spin
description: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate\nthe effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech\nSeed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

name: Doodle
description: The user captures the very essence of the target in a\nsketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally\nPokémon to that of the target.

name: Fillet Away
description: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed\nstats by using its own HP.

name: Kowtow Cleave
description: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make\nthe target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

name: Flower Trick
description: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the\ntarget. This attack never misses and always lands a\ncritical hit.

name: Torch Song
description: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song,\nscorching the target. This also boosts the user’s\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Aqua Step
description: The user toys with the target and attacks it using\nlight and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the\nuser’s Speed stat.

name: Raging Bull
description: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move’s\ntype depends on the user’s form. It can also break\nbarriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Make It Rain
description: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This\nalso lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after\nthe battle.

name: Psyblade
description: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This\nmove’s power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on\nElectric Terrain.

name: Hydro Steam
description: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This\nmove’s power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather\nboosted by 50 percent.

name: Ruination
description: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the\ntarget’s HP in half.

name: Collision Course
description: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing\na massive prehistoric explosion. This move’s power is\nboosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

name: Electro Drift
description: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its\ntarget with futuristic electricity. This move’s power is\nboosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

name: Shed Tail
description: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP\nbefore switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Chilly Reception
description: The user tells a chillingly bad joke before switching\nplaces with a party Pokémon in waiting. This summons a\nsnowstorm lasting five turns.

name: Tidy Up
description: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes,\nStealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute.\nThis also boosts the user’s Attack and Speed stats.

name: Snowscape
description: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.\nThis boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

name: Pounce
description: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also\nlowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Trailblaze
description: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall\ngrass. The user’s nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

name: Chilling Water
